title: 1st European Barndoor Gathering UK cruise to Amersfoort

posts.content:
Another update: Already 70 Barndoors pre-registered to the '1st European Barndoor Gathering & Vintage VW Show' and I know of more to come!
This will be an amazing sight! We can't wait to welcome you'll in Amersfoort, the Netherlands! [READ MORE]
Great news Niels

sausage fingers wrote:Great news Niels
Crazy isn't it! Love it! CAN'T WAIT!!

Yesterday evening I was a guest at 'De Staat van de Stad', the one and only talk-show in Amersfoort to talk about the Ben Pon Show!
It seems like everyone is looking forward to this weekend in April!! See you there!! - www.BenPon.nl

Updated for you as requested Claushema

For information, check out the Facebook Event - https://www.facebook.com/groups/521564004596988/

66 Blakey & Clare Rafferty - S042

Scottish splitty-66 13 window
Dave, Cee & the darkside
VWvandude 54 Barndoor ready to go..............

We are working hard on making this event as good and comple as possible. What we have arranged for you, our (foreign) visitors and weekend guests, is free WiFi during the show on Saturday and Sunday! This way you can keep in contact with your family and friends and of course show and share everything you see, do and enjoy during the event! Be sure if you do this to use #benpon ...I hope you'll can appreciate this free service!

Today's status February 18, 2014 is: 72 Barndoors, 26 Beetles, 80 Splitbuses and 8 other vehicles registered to the Ben Pon Show from 15 countries!!!

As you can see we would love to see more of the "other" VWs as well at the show! Do you own a Beetle, Type 3 1500S, Karmann Ghia Type14 or Type34, Swimmwagen, Kubelwagen Type82 or a Coachbuild vehicle like a Hebmuller, Denzel, Dannenhauer & Strauss etc ...be sure to register to the www.BenPon.nl Show as well!

More 'Ben Pon Show' in the media today!
A nice article in the local newspaper from Amersfoort and a full page in the 'Kever Club Nederland' club-magazine!
READ ALL ABOUT IT! - www.BenPon.nl
